info.description: This is the api for Joinself restful client.
info.title: Joinself restful-client API

post.description: Creates a new account and sends a request for public information. You must be authenticated as an admin.

delete.description: Changes the password for the current user. You must be authenticated.
delete.summary: Changes the password for the current user.

get.description: List restful client configured apps. You must be authenticated as an admin.

post.description: Creates a new app and sends a request for public information. You must be authenticated as an admin.

get.description: List connections matching the specified filters.

post.description: Creates a new connection and sends a request for public information.

get.description: List facts matching the specified filters.

post.description: Issues a fact to one of your connections.

get.description: Get fact details by fact request id.
List conversation messages with a specific connection.

parameters.description: return elements since a message id
parameters.name: messages_since

post.description: Sends a message to the specified connection.

put.description: Sends an edited message to the specified connection.

post.description: Sends a system notification to the given connection

put.description: Updates the properties of an existing connection..

delete.description: Deletes an existing connection and sends a request for public information and avoids incoming comms from that connection.

post.description: Sends a request request to the specified self user.

get.description: Get request details by request request id.

delete.description: Deletes an existing app and sends a request for public information and avoids incoming comms from that app. You must be authenticated as an admin.

get.description: check the service is up and running

post.description: Get a temporary JWT token to interact with the api.

callback.description: Callback is the url that will be hit when a message is received.

device_secret.description: DeviceSecret is the secret key for the device created at the developer portal.

env.description: Env is self environment you want to point to, when empty, it will default to production.

id.description: AppID is the Self app self identifier.

name.description: Name is the Self app name.

device_secret.description: DeviceSecret is the secret key for the device created at the developer portal.
